entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
